column3: Faculty of Arts, Science and Technology
column5: With our Computing (Computer Networks Engineering) MSc course, you will have the opportunity to study computing in great depth. In addition to completing an individual thesis on an area of computer networks engineering that is of particular interest to you, this course will also allow you to develop your research and analytical abilities. This will equip you with all the skills you need to enhance your career prospects further.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
